game

Class Witch

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.ZombieActor
        • game.Witch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActorInterface

    public class Witch
extends ZombieActor
    Class representing Witch as a form of an enemy that extends from zombieActor class. It has an ability of stun a player.
    Author:
    weijianlai

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
        Return the action to be performed during its turn. It stuns the player and moves one step in a random direction in the following turn. It will also moves closer to the Human, player but it will only stun the player.
        Specified by:
        playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
        map - the map containing the Actor
        display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
        lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed, e.g. stunning a player
